page.title: 07The Vicar's Lot,Lower Darwen
page.content: Each day begins with prayer. Without prayer everything done in{my}strength alone will always let me down. A phone call-Mrs.Jones asking me to visit her mother who is depressed. I write a few letters-one asking a local company for help in restyling the graveyard-an ever present trouble! Another phone call-a couple wanting to be married-interrupted by a knock at the door-it's{a tramp}with a hard luck story.We make sandwiches for him, ask him to do some weeding and give him Â£2. Next a visit to Mr.X who has a problem with his daughter followed by a{baptism}call on the Estate-and a welcome cup of tea! I spend an hour preparing a talk for weekend then call on Mrs.Y who has cancer.We pray together and enjoy a laugh.Life is hectic but it's great!
